package.name: components

path.file:
<?php
$config = json_decode(file_get_contents('config.json'));
class Builder {
  function concat($dest, $configGroup, $property){
    $f=fopen($dest, 'w');
    foreach($configGroup as $item){
      foreach($item->$property as $file) {
        $f1=fopen('bower_components/'.$file,'r');
        while($line=fread($f1)){
          fwrite($f,$line);
        }
        fclose($f1);
      }
    }
    fclose($f);
  }
  function run(){
    //Concat css
    $this->concat('css/main.css', $this->config->bower, 'css');
    //Concat js
    $this->concat('js/main.js', $this->config->bower, 'js');
  }
}

$builder = new Builder();
$builder->run();

trait RestServer {
  function initRestServer(){
    $GLOBALS['RestServer']=new \rest\Rest();
    $GLOBALS['RestServer']->init([
      '\depadmin\Composer'
    ]);
  }
  function sessionRestServer(){
    $_SESSION['RestServer']=[
      'apikey'=>'123'
    ];
  }
}

class ContextSpecification{
  use RestServer, RouterService;
  function initGlobals(){
    $methods=get_class_methods($this);
    $currentMethod=explode("::",__METHOD__)[1];
    foreach($methods as $m) {
      if($m!==$currentMethod && substr($m,0,4)==="init"){
        $this->$m();
      }
    }
  }
}

$a = new ContextSpecification();

$a->initGlobals();

package.name: html
package.page:
<?php header('Content-type: text/javascript'); ?>
$.fn.ajaxSubmit=function(callback){
    this.each(function(index){
      var multipart=this.enctype=="multipart/form-data";
      var formData=new FormData(this);
      if(!multipart){
        formData=$(this).serialize();
      }
      $.ajax({
          url:this.action ,
          method:this.method?this.method:'get',
          contentType:multipart?false:'application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8',
          processData: false,
          data:formData,
          success:function(res){
              if(typeof callback=="function") callback(res);
          }
      });
    });
}

<?php
//composer
require('../../vendor/autoload.php');
ini_set('display_errors', 'on');
error_reporting(E_ALL);
//header
//header('Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8');

//Core
class Window{
  public static function location($href){
    header("Location: $href");
  }
}
class CodedExceptionModel extends \model\Entity {
  public static function getTable(){
    return 'mensajes';
  }
}
class CodedExceptionImpl {
  function __construct(\model\CodedException $error){
    $this->error=$error;
  }
  function getMessage(){
    $c=MainConnection::getInstance()->instanceModel('CodedExceptionModel',[]);
    list($owner,$code)=explode('.',$this->error->getMessage());
    $row=$c->findByKey('CODE', $owner, $code, 'ERROR');
    return $row->description;
  }
}


global $model;
$model = new StdClass();
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////MODEL/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

class MainConnection extends \model\Connection {
  public function __construct(){
    parent::__construct('mysql:host=localhost;dbname=main', 'root', 'root', array(PDO::MYSQL_ATTR_INIT_COMMAND => 'SET NAMES UTF8;') );
  }
}
class LoginModel extends \model\Entity {
  public static function getTable(){
    return 'login';
  }
  public static function getRowClass(){
    return '\LoginRow';
  }
}
class LoginRow extends \model\Row {
  public function insert(){
    parent::insert();
    Window::location("index.html");
  }
}

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////END MODEL/////////////////////////////////////////////////////
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

//session_start requires MODEL CLASSES
session_start();


$action=@$_REQUEST['a'];
if($action==='submit'){
  $o = $_SESSION[$action.'_context'];
  $m = $_SESSION[$action.'_click'];
  foreach($_SESSION[$action.'_fields'] as $f){
    $o->$f=$_REQUEST[$f];
  }
  try{
    $o->$m();
  } catch(\model\CodedException $eee){
    $e1 = new CodedExceptionImpl( $eee );
    echo $e1->getMessage();
  }
  die;
} else {
  /////////////////INITIAL CODE FOR TEMPLATES ///////////////////////
  global $context;
  $context=$GLOBALS;
  $_SESSION['submit_fields']=[];
  /////////////////CODE FOR TEMPLATES ///////////////////////
  $connection = MainConnection::getInstance();
  $login = $connection->instanceModel('LoginModel',[]);
  $model->login = $login;
  /////////////////END CODE FOR TEMPLATES ///////////////////////
  /////////////////END INITIAL CODE FOR TEMPLATES ///////////////////////
}



function &getFC($id){
  global $context;
  if(is_array($context)){
    return $context[$id];
  } else {
    return $context->$id;
  }
}
function bind($def0, $ctx=null){
  global $model;
  if(!$ctx) $ctx=&$GLOBALS['context'];
  else $GLOBALS['context']=&$ctx;
  foreach(explode(',',$def0) as $def){
    list($type,$d)=explode(":",$def,2);
    $type=trim($type);
    $d=trim($d);
    switch($type){
      case 'submit':
        $GLOBALS['context']=eval('return '.$d.';');
        echo ' action="?a=submit" method="post" ';
        $_SESSION['submit_context']=$GLOBALS['context'];
        break;
      case 'input':
        echo " name='$d'";
        $_SESSION['submit_fields'][]=$d;
        break;
      case 'click':
          echo ' onclick="$(this).parents(\'form:first\')[0].submit()" ';
          $_SESSION['submit_click']=$d;
        break;
    }
  }
}
